sen.j: 東吉野温泉（ひがしよしのおんせん）は、奈良県吉野郡東吉野村（旧国大和国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring is the hot spring which is located in Higashiyoshino-mura, Yoshino gun, Nara Prefecture (old province, Yamato province).
Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring which is located in Higashiyoshino-mura, Yoshino gun, Nara Prefecture (old province, Yamato province).
sen.cmt: is the hot spring → is a hot spring
sen.e: Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring which is located in Higashiyoshino-mura, Yoshino gun, Nara Prefecture (old province, Yamato province).

sen.j: 東吉野村内の温泉地は3ヶ所に分散していて、それぞれ、「東吉野温泉」「たかすみ温泉」「やはた温泉」とよばれている。
sen.e: Hot spring areas in Higashiyoshino-mura are dispersed into three areas and are referred to as "Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring", "Takasumi Onsen Hot Spring" and "Yahata Onsen Hot Spring", respectively.

Hot spring areas in Higashiyoshino-mura are dispersed into three areas and are referred to as "Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring", "Takasumi Onsen Hot Spring" and "Yahata Onsen Hot Spring", respectively.

Hot spring areas in Higashiyoshino-mura are dispersed into three areas and are referred to as 'Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring', 'Takasumi Onsen Hot Spring' and 'Yahata Onsen Hot Spring,' respectively.

sen.j: 車：名阪国道針インターチェンジから国道369号・国道166号を経由し、
sen.e: By car: Go through National Route 369 and 166 at Meihan Kokudo Hari Interchange,
By car: Go through National Route 369 and 166 at Meihan Kokudo Hari Interchange,
By car: Go through National Route 369 and 166 at Meihan Kokudo Hari Interchange,

sen.j: 東吉野温泉（木津地区）：国道166号沿い。
sen.e: Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring (Kizu district) is located along National Route 166.
Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring (Kizu district) is located along National Route 166.
Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring (Kizu district) is located along National Route 166.

sen.j: たかすみ温泉（下平野地区）：東吉野村出合付近から奈良県道28号吉野室生寺針線を北へ。
sen.e: Takasumi Onsen Hot Spring: Take Nara Prefectural Road No.28 Yoshino-Muroji-Hari Route to the north from around Deai, Higashiyoshino Village.
Takasumi Onsen Hot Spring (Shimohirano district): Take Nara Prefectural Road No.28 Yoshino-Muroji-Hari Route to the north from around Deai, Higashiyoshino Village.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れあり。「（下平野地区）」の訳を追加。
sen.e: Takasumi Onsen Hot Spring (Shimohirano district): Take Nara Prefectural Road No.28 Yoshino-Muroji-Hari Route to the north from around Deai, Higashiyoshino Village.

sen.j: やはた温泉（大豆生地区）：東吉野村鷲家付近から奈良県道16号吉野東吉野線を経て、小川地区（村役場付近）から四郷川に沿ってのぼる。
sen.e: Yahata Onsen Hot Spring (Mameo district): Go through Nara Prefectural Road No.16 Yoshino-Higashiyoshino Route from around Washika, Higashiyoshino Village, and then go along Shigo-gawa River from Ogawa District (around the village office).

Yahata Onsen Hot Spring (Mameo district): Go through Nara Prefectural Road No.16 Yoshino-Higashiyoshino Route from around Washika, Higashiyoshino Village, and then go along the Shigo-gawa River from Ogawa District (around the village office).

Yahata Onsen Hot Spring (Mameo district): Go through Nara Prefectural Road No.16 Yoshino-Higashiyoshino Route from around Washika, Higashiyoshino Village, and then go along the Shigo-gawa River from Ogawa District (around the village office).

sen.j: 東吉野温泉：ナトリウム炭酸水素塩泉 泉温38度
sen.e: Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring: sodium hydrocarbonate springs, and senon (hot spring temperature) is 38 degrees.
Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring: sodium hydrocarbonate springs, and senon (hot spring temperature) is 38 degrees Celsius.
Higashi-yoshino Onsen Hot Spring: sodium hydrocarbonate springs, and senon (hot spring temperature) is 38 degrees Celsius.

sen.j: たかすみ温泉：弱アルカリ性Na‐塩化物泉
sen.e: Takasumi Onsen Hot Spring: weak alkaline salt spring
Takasumi Onsen Hot Spring: weak alkaline salt spring
Takasumi Onsen Hot Spring: weak alkaline salt spring

sen.j: やはた温泉：ナトリウム水素塩泉 泉温20度
sen.e: Yahata Onsen Hot Spring: sodium hydrocarbonate springs, and senon (hot spring temperature) is 20 degrees.
sen.cmt: ナトリウム水素塩泉は、ナトリウム炭酸水素塩泉と思われるので、ナトリウム炭酸水素塩泉で訳しました。
sen.e: Yahata Onsen Hot Spring: sodium hydrocarbonate springs, and senon (hot spring temperature) is 20 degrees Celsius.
Yahata Onsen Hot Spring: sodium hydrocarbonate springs, and senon (hot spring temperature) is 20 degrees Celsius.

sen.j: いわゆる「温泉街」はなく、それぞれの源泉の元湯として日帰り入浴施設がある。
sen.e: There is no so-called "hot springs resort area", but there is day visit spa as 元湯 of each source of hot springs.
sen.cmt: 元湯の意味および読み方がわかりませんでした。
sen.e: There is no so-called "hot springs resort area," but there is a day visit spa as 元湯 of each source of hot springs.
sen.cmt: カンマを右引用符の中に移動、day visit spaに冠詞a を付与。
sen.e: There is no so-called 'hot springs resort area', but there are day visit spas using water directly from the source of each of the hot springs.
